msbt.message: Just imagine being an artist faced with a blank canvas and how intimidating that must feel. Somehow, you must breathe life into this empty void. Create beauty out of your dreams and desires. Me? I don't have to imagine. That describes how I feel every morning when I get dressed, .
When discussing art, it's essential to bring up the artist's point of view.In my experience, it's a surefire way to sound way smarter than you actually are. Ha HA!

Whenever I look at a piece of art, I'm always curious about the person behind the canvas or statue. I wonder Did they always want to be an artist? Did they do it for the glamor and fame? What kind of VIP access do you get as a famous artist?Art. It really makes you think.
Are you enjoying all the art that has to offer?I'm pleased to hear it. You've been giving off all kinds of sophisticated and discerning vibes, .
Do you consider yourself a connoisseur of the arts?Ah yes. Me too. I don't find this kind of thing dull at all!
Art shows us that there are no limits in this world That we are all free to be true to ourselves. Plus it's really pretty!

I've been waiting so long for 's museum to get an art wing of its very own. Now that it's finally here, I can barely contain myself!Sure, the art is great and stuff, but now our island has something even better Status!
Hmm It's still a little empty in here. Maybe I should consider donating myself as a temporary display. I'm already used to folks stopping and staring at me with wide-eyed admiration, .

I recently had a dream that was making a name for itself in the art world. And now here we areliving the dream, literally.Do you think this means that my dreams can predict the future? I sincerely hope not! Last night I dreamed that my entire shoe collection went up in flames!
